message:
SYSTEM: Linked_Games_research_presentation.pdf: Página 19
Gamecloud – The Research
• The big question: Would it be possible to connect games in more
deeper manner and ease the development of such cross-overs?
• We have interviewed a lot of Finnish companies about connecting
games and their worlds
• Rovio, Supercell, Remedy, Bugbear, Kukouri, etc.
• Big interest in the topic. Some believe more, some don’t
• Biggest problem: the lack of knowledge of all possible technology
(where wouldn’t be?)
speaker: SYSTEM
